Configuration

The configuration window, it holds the different values that are available in the config file and allows the user to modify them.

class GUI.config_menu.menu(root, config)

The config menu.

Its function signatures are

GUI.config_menu.menu.add_elements(self)

Adds all tkinter elements to the config window.

GUI.config_menu.menu.grid_elements(self)

Sets the position of all tkinter elements in the main window.

GUI.config_menu.menu.validation(self, value: str, origin: str)

Validates all user defined information.

Parameters

  • value – the value in the text field at the time of validation

  • origin – the origin of the validation trigger it represents one of the text fields in the window.

GUI.config_menu.menu.invalid(self, origin: str)

If the validation of the field didn’t pass, what actions to take.

Parameters

origin – the origin of the validation trigger it represents one of the text fields in the window.

GUI.config_menu.menu.save_config(self)

Saves the configuration from the elements displayed.
